attributes.action: call the Police to investigate the very public allegations corruption and misconduct amongst sitting and retired MPS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We do not believe that it serves the interests of justice for any Police enquiry to wait for a parliamentary standards enquiry to complete its work. The politically influenced parliamentary standards enquiry may well prejudice any subsequent prosecutions and the interests of justice demand that the criminal process is exhausted first. MPS should have no privileges above the law and should face justice as would any other person accused of such wrongdoing.

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
